name: Egg Muffin To Go

ingredients.name: Lemon Dilly, 3 Onion, or CCB Dip

preparation: Fry egg in a fry pan over medium heat.
Meanwhile, toast English muffin. Spread one half of toasted English muffin with dip. Top with cheese, tomato, and spinach.
Season egg to taste with salt and pepper; place on top of spinach. Sandwich with muffin top.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1⁄2 cup 2% plain Greek yogurt and 1⁄2 cup mixed berries.

products.name: Lemon Dilly Dip Mix
summary: Beyond being one of our most-loved kid-friendly dips – they love it for dunking chicken strips, fish bites, and veggies – Lemon Dilly is all about versatility. With loads of dill and a hint of lemon zest, it makes an utterly delicious tzatziki and spread for burgers and sandwiches, and levels up everything from salad dressing and salmon to pasta and vegetables.

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!

products.name: CCB Dip Mix
summary: Cheese. Chives. Bacon. How's that for a totally irresistible trio? Our very own smoky vegetarian bacon, made from pinto beans, is the secret star of this oh-so-yummy dip.
This blend is all about versatility and we recommend taking it way beyond the dip bowl—use CCB in any dish that could use a little levelling up.
